channel.title: My server randomly stopped working after i reset my router -please help-
channel.description: ok so just today im make a private server and my internet was being slow so i went over to the router and pulled the plug then put it back in. and now it always says "error connecting to server" i cant connect to my server at all now and just before i reset the router it was all good! someone please please answer this and help. if you have team viewer lets do that.

item.title: My server randomly stopped working after i reset my router -please help-

item.description:

do u know what happens when the router is reset…
